arcApplicationClientId.description: App id of arc AAD identity.

arcApplicationObjectId.description: Object id of arc AAD identity.

arcApplicationTenantId.description: Tenant id of arc AAD identity.

arcInstanceResourceGroup.description: The resource group that hosts the Arc agents, ie. Hybrid Compute Machine resources.

arcServicePrincipalObjectId.description: Object id of arc AAD service principal.

connectivityProperties.description: contains connectivity related configuration for ARC resources

diagnosticLevel.description: Desired level of diagnostic data emitted by the cluster.

windowsServerSubscription.description: Desired state of Windows Server Subscription.

aadApplicationObjectId.description: Object id of cluster AAD identity.

aadClientId.description: App id of cluster AAD identity.

aadServicePrincipalObjectId.description: Id of cluster identity service principal.

aadTenantId.description: Tenant id of cluster AAD identity.

cloudManagementEndpoint.description: Endpoint configured for management from the Azure portal.

softwareAssuranceProperties.description: Software Assurance properties of the cluster.

routes.description: Routes - Collection of routes contained within a route table.

ComponentsCr63WSchemasVirtualnetworkprop.description: IPConfigurationReference - Describes a IPConfiguration under the virtual network

id.description: Etag - Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

name.description: Name - READ-ONLY; Resource name.

ExtendedLocation.description: The complex type of the extended location.

name.description: The name of the extended location.

type.description: The type of the extended location.

ExtensionParameters.description: Describes the properties of a Machine Extension. This object mirrors the definition in HybridCompute.

autoUpgradeMinorVersion.description: Indicates whether the extension should use a newer minor version if one is available at deployment time. Once deployed, however, the extension will not upgrade minor versions unless redeployed, even with this property set to true.

enableAutomaticUpgrade.description: Indicates whether the extension should be automatically upgraded by the platform if there is a newer version available.

forceUpdateTag.description: How the extension handler should be forced to update even if the extension configuration has not changed.

publisher.description: The name of the extension handler publisher.

settings.description: Json formatted public settings for the extension.

type.description: Specifies the type of the extension; an example is "CustomScriptExtension".

typeHandlerVersion.description: Specifies the version of the script handler. Latest version would be used if not specified.

ExtensionProperties.description: Status of Arc Extension for a particular node in HCI Cluster.

extensionParameters.description: Parameters specific to this extension type.

GalleryImageIdentifier.description: This is the gallery image definition identifier.

offer.description: The name of the gallery image definition offer.

publisher.description: The name of the gallery image definition publisher.

sku.description: The name of the gallery image definition SKU.

GalleryImageProperties.description: Properties under the gallery image resource

cloudInitDataSource.description: Datasource for the gallery image when provisioning with cloud-init [NoCloud, Azure]

hyperVGeneration.description: The hypervisor generation of the Virtual Machine [V1, V2]

identifier.description: This is the gallery image definition identifier.

imagePath.description: location of the image the gallery image should be created from

osType.description: Operating system type that the gallery image uses [Windows, Linux]

version.description: Specifies information about the gallery image version that you want to create or update.

GalleryImageVersion.description: Specifies information about the gallery image version that you want to create or update.

name.description: This is the version of the gallery image.

properties.description: Describes the properties of a gallery image version.

GalleryImageVersionProperties.description: Describes the properties of a gallery image version.

storageProfile.description: This is the storage profile of a Gallery Image Version.

GalleryImageVersionStorageProfile.description: This is the storage profile of a Gallery Image Version.

osDiskImage.description: This is the OS disk image.

GalleryOSDiskImage.description: This is the OS disk image.

credentials.description: Username / Password Credentials to provision guest agent.

httpProxyConfig.description: HTTP Proxy configuration for the VM.

GuestCredential.description: Username / Password Credentials to connect to guest.

password.description: The password to connect with the guest.

username.description: The username to connect with the guest.

HttpProxyConfiguration.description: HTTP Proxy configuration for the VM.

resourceUid.description: The unique identifier for the resource.

IPConfiguration.description: InterfaceIPConfiguration iPConfiguration in a network interface.

name.description: Name - The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

privateIPAddress.description: PrivateIPAddress - Private IP address of the IP configuration.

privateIPAllocationMethod.description: PrivateIPAllocationMethod - The private IP address allocation method. Possible values include: 'Static', 'Dynamic'

subnet.description: Subnet - Name of Subnet bound to the IP configuration.

IPConfigurationPropertiesSubnet.description: Subnet - Name of Subnet bound to the IP configuration.

id.description: ID - The ARM resource id in the form of /subscriptions/{SubscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/...

end.description: end of the ip address pool

start.description: start of the ip address pool

dnsServers.description: List of DNS server IP Addresses for the interface

MachineExtensionProperties.description: Describes the properties of a Machine Extension.

autoUpgradeMinorVersion.description: Indicates whether the extension should use a newer minor version if one is available at deployment time. Once deployed, however, the extension will not upgrade minor versions unless redeployed, even with this property set to true.

forceUpdateTag.description: How the extension handler should be forced to update even if the extension configuration has not changed.

protectedSettings.description: The extension can contain either protectedSettings or protectedSettingsFromKeyVault or no protected settings at all.

publisher.description: The name of the extension handler publisher.

settings.description: Json formatted public settings for the extension.

type.description: Specifies the type of the extension; an example is "CustomScriptExtension".

typeHandlerVersion.description: Specifies the version of the script handler.

ManagedServiceIdentity.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

type.description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

userAssignedIdentities.description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

MarketplaceGalleryImageProperties.description: Properties under the marketplace gallery image resource

cloudInitDataSource.description: Datasource for the gallery image when provisioning with cloud-init [NoCloud, Azure]

hyperVGeneration.description: The hypervisor generation of the Virtual Machine [V1, V2]

identifier.description: This is the gallery image definition identifier.

osType.description: Operating system type that the gallery image uses [Windows, Linux]

version.description: Specifies information about the gallery image version that you want to create or update.

NetworkInterfaceProperties.description: Properties under the network interface resource

ipConfigurations.description: IPConfigurations - A list of IPConfigurations of the network interface.

macAddress.description: MacAddress - The MAC address of the network interface.

PackageVersionInfo.description: Current version of each updatable component.

lastUpdated.description: Last time this component was updated.

additionalData.description: Property bag of key value pairs for additional information.

description.description: Detailed overview of the issue and what impact the issue has on the stamp.

healthCheckSource.description: The name of the services called for the HealthCheck (I.E. Test-AzureStack, Test-Cluster).

healthCheckTags.description: Key-value pairs that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

name.description: Name of the individual test/rule/alert that was executed. Unique, not exposed to the customer.

remediation.description: Set of steps that can be taken to resolve the issue found.

severity.description: Severity of the result (Critical, Warning, Informational, Hidden). This answers how important the result is. Critical is the only update-blocking severity.

status.description: The status of the check running (i.e. Failed, Succeeded, In Progress). This answers whether the check ran, and passed or failed.

tags.description: Key-value pairs that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

targetResourceID.description: The unique identifier for the affected resource (such as a node or drive).

targetResourceName.description: The name of the affected resource.

targetResourceType.description: The type of resource being referred to (well-known set of nouns in infrastructure, aligning with Monitoring).

timestamp.description: The Time in which the HealthCheck was called.

title.description: User-facing name; one or more sentences indicating the direct issue.

additionalData.description: Property bag of key value pairs for additional information.

description.description: Detailed overview of the issue and what impact the issue has on the stamp.

healthCheckSource.description: The name of the services called for the HealthCheck (I.E. Test-AzureStack, Test-Cluster).

healthCheckTags.description: Key-value pairs that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

name.description: Name of the individual test/rule/alert that was executed. Unique, not exposed to the customer.

remediation.description: Set of steps that can be taken to resolve the issue found.

severity.description: Severity of the result (Critical, Warning, Informational, Hidden). This answers how important the result is. Critical is the only update-blocking severity.

status.description: The status of the check running (i.e. Failed, Succeeded, In Progress). This answers whether the check ran, and passed or failed.

tags.description: Key-value pairs that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

targetResourceID.description: The unique identifier for the affected resource (such as a node or drive).

targetResourceName.description: The name of the affected resource.

targetResourceType.description: The type of resource being referred to (well-known set of nouns in infrastructure, aligning with Monitoring).

timestamp.description: The Time in which the HealthCheck was called.

title.description: User-facing name; one or more sentences indicating the direct issue.

PrecheckResultTags.description: Key-value pairs that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

key.description: Key that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

value.description: Value of the key that allow grouping/filtering individual tests.

SoftwareAssuranceProperties.description: Software Assurance properties of the cluster.

softwareAssuranceIntent.description: Customer Intent for Software Assurance Benefit.

softwareAssuranceStatus.description: Status of the Software Assurance for the cluster.

Step.description: Progress representation of the update run steps.

description.description: More detailed description of the step.

endTimeUtc.description: When the step reached a terminal state.

errorMessage.description: Error message, specified if the step is in a failed state.

expectedExecutionTime.description: Expected execution time of a given step. This is optionally authored in the update action plan and can be empty.

lastUpdatedTimeUtc.description: Completion time of this step or the last completed sub-step.

name.description: Name of the step.

startTimeUtc.description: When the step started, or empty if it has not started executing.

status.description: Status of the step, bubbled up from the ECE action plan for installation attempts. Values are: 'Success', 'Error', 'InProgress', and 'Unknown status'.

steps.description: Recursive model for child steps of this step.

StorageContainerProperties.description: Properties under the storage container resource

path.description: Path of the storage container on the disk

UpdatePrerequisite.description: If update State is HasPrerequisite, this property contains an array of objects describing prerequisite updates before installing this update. Otherwise, it is empty.

UpdateProperties.description: Details of a singular Update in HCI Cluster

additionalProperties.description: Extensible KV pairs serialized as a string. This is currently used to report the stamp OEM family and hardware model information when an update is flagged as Invalid for the stamp based on OEM type.

availabilityType.description: Indicates the way the update content can be downloaded.

componentVersions.description: An array of component versions for a Solution Bundle update, and an empty array otherwise.

healthCheckDate.description: Last time the package-specific checks were run.

healthState.description: Overall health state for update-specific health checks.

installedDate.description: Date that the update was installed.

packagePath.description: Path where the update package is available.

packageSizeInMb.description: Size of the package. This value is a combination of the size from update metadata and size of the payload that results from the live scan operation for OS update content.

prerequisites.description: If update State is HasPrerequisite, this property contains an array of objects describing prerequisite updates before installing this update. Otherwise, it is empty.

releaseLink.description: Link to release notes for the update.

state.description: State of the update as it relates to this stamp.

updateStateProperties.description: Additional information regarding the state of the update. See definition of UpdateStateProperties type below for more details on this property.

lastUpdatedTime.description: Timestamp of the most recently completed step in the update run.

progress.description: Progress representation of the update run steps.

timeStarted.description: Timestamp of the update run was started.

UpdateStateProperties.description: Additional information regarding the state of the update. See definition of UpdateStateProperties type below for more details on this property.

notifyMessage.description: Brief message with instructions for updates of AvailabilityType Notify.

progressPercentage.description: Progress percentage of ongoing operation. Currently this property is only valid when the update is in the Downloading state, where it maps to how much of the update content has been downloaded.

currentVersion.description: Current Solution Bundle version of the stamp.

healthCheckDate.description: Last time the package-specific checks were run.

healthCheckResult.description: An array of pre-check result objects.

healthState.description: Overall health state for update-specific health checks.

lastChecked.description: Last time the update service successfully checked for updates

lastUpdated.description: Last time an update installation completed successfully.

packageVersions.description: Current version of each updatable component.

state.description: Overall update state of the stamp.

VirtualHardDiskProperties.description: Properties under the virtual hard disk resource

containerId.description: Storage ContainerID of the storage container to be used for VHD

diskFileFormat.description: The format of the actual VHD file [vhd, vhdx]

diskSizeGB.description: Size of the disk in GB

dynamic.description: Boolean for enabling dynamic sizing on the virtual hard disk

hyperVGeneration.description: The hypervisor generation of the Virtual Machine [V1, V2]

VirtualMachineProperties.description: Properties under the virtual machine resource

hardwareProfile.description: HardwareProfile - Specifies the hardware settings for the virtual machine.

networkProfile.description: NetworkProfile - describes the network configuration the virtual machine

osProfile.description: OsProfile - describes the configuration of the operating system and sets login data

securityProfile.description: SecurityProfile - Specifies the security settings for the virtual machine.

storageProfile.description: StorageProfile - contains information about the disks and storage information for the virtual machine

VirtualMachinePropertiesHardwareProfile.description: HardwareProfile - Specifies the hardware settings for the virtual machine.

memoryMB.description: RAM in MB for the virtual machine

processors.description: number of processors for the virtual machine

targetMemoryBuffer.description: Defines the amount of extra memory that should be reserved for a virtual machine at runtime, as a percentage of the total memory that the virtual machine is thought to need. This only applies to virtual systems with dynamic memory enabled. This property can be in the range of 5 to 2000.

VirtualMachinePropertiesNetworkProfile.description: NetworkProfile - describes the network configuration the virtual machine

networkInterfaces.description: NetworkInterfaces - list of network interfaces to be attached to the virtual machine

id.description: ID - Resource Id of the network interface

VirtualMachinePropertiesOsProfile.description: OsProfile - describes the configuration of the operating system and sets login data

linuxConfiguration.description: LinuxConfiguration - linux specific configuration values for the virtual machine

osType.description: OsType - string specifying whether the OS is Linux or Windows

windowsConfiguration.description: Windows Configuration for the virtual machine

VirtualMachinePropertiesOsProfileLinuxCo.description: LinuxConfiguration - linux specific configuration values for the virtual machine

disablePasswordAuthentication.description: DisablePasswordAuthentication - whether password authentication should be disabled

provisionVMAgent.description: Used to indicate whether Arc for Servers agent onboarding should be triggered during the virtual machine creation process.

ssh.description: SSH - contains settings related to ssh configuration

VirtualMachinePropertiesOsProfileLinuxCo.description: SSH - contains settings related to ssh configuration

publicKeys.description: PublicKeys - The list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with linux based VMs.

keyData.description:
KeyData - SSH public key certificate used to authenticate with the VM through ssh. The key needs to be at least 2048-bit and in ssh-rsa format.

For creating ssh keys, see [Create SSH keys on Linux and Mac for Li nux VMs in Azure](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/virtual-machines-linux-mac-create-ssh-keys?toc=%2fazure%2fvirtual-machines%2flinux%2ftoc.json).

path.description: Path - Specifies the full path on the created VM where ssh public key is stored. If the file already exists, the specified key is appended to the file. Example: /home/user/.ssh/authorized_keys

VirtualMachinePropertiesOsProfileWindows.description: Windows Configuration for the virtual machine

enableAutomaticUpdates.description: Whether to EnableAutomaticUpdates on the machine

provisionVMAgent.description: Used to indicate whether Arc for Servers agent onboarding should be triggered during the virtual machine creation process.

publicKeys.description: PublicKeys - The list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with linux based VMs.

keyData.description:
KeyData - SSH public key certificate used to authenticate with the VM through ssh. The key needs to be at least 2048-bit and in ssh-rsa format.

For creating ssh keys, see [Create SSH keys on Linux and Mac for Li nux VMs in Azure](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/virtual-machines-linux-mac-create-ssh-keys?toc=%2fazure%2fvirtual-machines%2flinux%2ftoc.json).

path.description: Path - Specifies the full path on the created VM where ssh public key is stored. If the file already exists, the specified key is appended to the file. Example: /home/user/.ssh/authorized_keys

VirtualMachinePropertiesSecurityProfile.description: SecurityProfile - Specifies the security settings for the virtual machine.

secureBootEnabled.description: Specifies whether secure boot should be enabled on the virtual machine.

VirtualMachinePropertiesStorageProfile.description: StorageProfile - contains information about the disks and storage information for the virtual machine

dataDisks.description: adds data disks to the virtual machine

imageReference.description: Which Image to use for the virtual machine

osDisk.description: VHD to attach as OS disk

vmConfigStoragePathId.description: Id of the storage container that hosts the VM configuration file

id.description: Resource ID of the data disk

VirtualMachinePropertiesStorageProfileIm.description: Which Image to use for the virtual machine

VirtualMachinePropertiesStorageProfileOs.description: VHD to attach as OS disk

id.description: Resource ID of the OS disk

VirtualNetworkProperties.description: Properties under the virtual network resource

dhcpOptions.description: DhcpOptions contains an array of DNS servers available to VMs deployed in the virtual network. Standard DHCP option for a subnet overrides VNET DHCP options.

subnets.description: Subnet - list of subnets under the virtual network

vmSwitchName.description: name of the network switch to be used for VMs

VirtualNetworkPropertiesDhcpOptions.description: DhcpOptions contains an array of DNS servers available to VMs deployed in the virtual network. Standard DHCP option for a subnet overrides VNET DHCP options.

dnsServers.description: The list of DNS servers IP addresses.

VirtualNetworkPropertiesSubnetsItem.description: Subnet subnet in a virtual network resource.

name.description: Name - The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

addressPrefix.description: Cidr for this subnet - IPv4, IPv6

addressPrefixes.description: AddressPrefixes - List of address prefixes for the subnet.

ipAllocationMethod.description: IPAllocationMethod - The IP address allocation method. Possible values include: 'Static', 'Dynamic'

ipPools.description: network associated pool of IP Addresses

vlan.description: Vlan to use for the subnet

addressPrefix.description: AddressPrefix - The destination CIDR to which the route applies.

nextHopIpAddress.description: NextHopIPAddress - The IP address packets should be forwarded to. Next hop values are only allowed in routes where the next hop type is VirtualAppliance.

VirtualNetworkPropertiesSubnetsPropertie.description: Route is associated with a subnet.

name.description: Name - name of the subnet
